attributes.action: Make law a mandatory 5 year prison term for possession of a knife in public.
attributes.additional_details: If the government has the slightest of concern about the rising rate of knife crime in the UK then passing a mandatory sentence for possession of a bladed object in public of five years is a must to protect the law abiding citizens of the country. Any MP that votes against such a bill obviously does not care about crime in the UK.
attributes.background: Pass into law a mandatory five year prison sentence for possession of a bladed implement without good cause in public.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences relating to knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563199

Minimum 10-year sentence for knife possession and 20 years for use of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580709
